# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value and quality. I believe it can significantly enhance your daily life or work, making it a worthwhile investment. For this unique opportunity, I am offering the product at a special introductory price of $150. Please let me know if you're interested in exploring how this product can benefit you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer
